name: Health Potion
description: A healing potion typical of high fantasy worlds, capable of healing wounds instantly.

name: Felix Felicis
description: A vial of liquid luck, drinking this will make your attacks hit more often in combat. Any resemblance to potions real or fictional is purely coincidential.

name: Wooden Sword
description: A short wooden sword, capable of cutting even the mightiest of small bushes.

name: Rounded Buckler
description: A small round buckler, capable of protecting one from fatal blows from anything ranging from small house cats to medium-sized domesticated dogs.

name: Leather Armor
description: A classic set of leather armor, complete with gauntlets and boots. Stylish, yet functional.

name: Front Door Key
description: The key to the front door of your house. Can't leave home without it. Or I guess you could, if you want your house to be robbed.

name: Odd Key
description: What is this key for? You have no idea where you got it from, but you refuse to part with it because it could come in handy some day.

name: Macguffin
description: This item will defeat the boss of the game and make you rich, but only after finishing your quest. Why? Because I said so.

name: Iron Armor
description: Armor made from iron, stronger than leather but weaker than steel.

name: Apple
description: A delicious red apple, free from any sort of sophoric poisons as far as you know.

name: Wine
description: A fine aged wine. You can't wait for the day to end so you can drink it.

name: Banana
description: A plain banana. It seems to be getting overly ripe more quickly than you would expect.

name: Iron sword
description: An iron sword, stronger than a wooden sword but weaker than a steel sword.
